title: Frontiers Neuroeng
description: Neuroengineering issues related to measurement and manipulation of the nervous system for basic scientific discovery and treatment of neurological disorders.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (BMED 2400 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOS 4401 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PSYC 2020 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3215 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3225 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3670 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (CS 1301 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CS 1371 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (BMED 3100 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or NEUR 2001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOS 3755 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
